thread.title: After Toby Keith Performed at Inauguration, LOOK What Critics are Threatening…
thread.title_full: After Toby Keith Performed at Inauguration, LOOK What Critics are Threatening…

author: Nickarama
title: After Toby Keith Performed at Inauguration, LOOK What Critics are Threatening…
text:
10:15pm February 10, 2017   
Country music star Toby Keith is getting blowback after playing at the inauguration for President Donald Trump. 
He is scheduled to perform at the Ribfest music festival in Naperville, Illnois. 
But the festival is being pressured to drop him from the line-up because his inauguration performance. 
From Fox News: 
A country music festival in Naperville, Ill. is facing pressure to kick Toby Keith out of their lineup after some residents deemed the singer “too political” after his performance at President Donald Trump’s inauguration. 
Keith, who did not support any candidate in the 2016 presidential election, was forced to defend his decision to perform at the inauguration saying at the time he does not “apologize for performing for our country or military.” 
The critics behind the pressure are also complaining about his lyrics. 
The residents of Naperville, where Ribfest will be hosted on June 30, said they protested Keith’s upcoming performance not only because of his inauguration performance, but also because they say some of his lyrics were inappropriate. (Though they did not identify said lyrics.) 
However, Ribfest said that decisions were made months in advance and are not based on politics. 
They refused to drop him, despite the pressure. 
Good, this is starting to get a little ridiculous. 
He didn’t even express any support for President Donald Trump. 
Just performing in and of itself is now “too political” to be heard? 
Are the lyrics too American for the critics? 
Are “red, white and blue” lyrics now too much? LIKE this article?
